languages.text: {n}Слуги одновременно ахают. Пузатый слуга качает головой и обращается к вам:{/n} "Вот что называется истинн{rt_mf|ый|ая} власт{rt_mf|елин|ительница} миров — не то что наш Руолдо... Вот бы и мне звездной пыли с подошв Звездн{rt_mf|ого|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дина|жи} отведать! Повезло же тебе, Мейв!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Слуги одновременно ахают. Пузатый слуга качает головой и обращается к вам:{/n} "Вот, что происходит, когда господа скучают. Ты должна была приложить больше усилий, чтобы развлечь Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу}, Мейв".

languages.text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"
languages.original_text: {n}Слуги одновременно ахают. Пузатый слуга качает головой и обращается к вам:{/n} "Вот что называется истинн{rt_mf|ый|ая} власт{rt_mf|елин|ительница} миров — не то что наш Руолдо... Вот бы и мне звездной пыли с подошв Звездн{rt_mf|ого|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дина|жи} отведать! Повезло же тебе, Мейв!"

Our Ruoldo's not a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord's|Lady's} boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord's|Lady's} boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

{n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

languages.text: {n}三个仆人全都倒吸了一口冷气。那位大腹便便的仆人摇着头，对你开了口。{/n}“这位大人才是群星真正的统治者啊！相比之下，咱们的罗尔多大人连块补丁都算不上……要是我也能品尝到那位大人靴子上的星尘就好了！梅芙啊梅芙，你运气怎么这么好！”
languages.original_text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}三个仆人全都倒吸了一口冷气。那位大腹便便的仆人摇着头，对你开了口。{/n}“这位大人才是群星真正的统治者啊！相比之下，咱们的罗尔多大人连块补丁都算不上……要是我也能品尝到那位大人靴子上的星尘就好了！梅芙啊梅芙，你运气怎么这么好！”

languages.text: {n}Todos los sirvientes dejan escapar un grito ahogado. El regordete niega con la cabeza y dice:{/n} «Eso sí que es un{rt_mf||a} gobernante de mundos. Nuestro Ruoldo no es nadie en comparación... ¡Ojalá yo también pudiera saborear el polvo estelar de las botas de{rt_mf|l Señor| la Señora} Celestial! ¡Qué suerte tienes, Maive!».
languages.original_text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Todos los sirvientes dejan escapar un grito ahogado. El regordete niega con la cabeza y dice:{/n} «Eso sí que es un{rt_mf||a} gobernante de mundos. Nuestro Ruoldo no es nadie en comparación... ¡Ojalá yo también pudiera saborear el polvo estelar de las botas de{rt_mf|l Señor| la Señora} Celestial! ¡Qué suerte tienes, Maive!».

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkârların hepsi birden soluğunu tutuyor. Göbekli olan, başını sallayıp sana dönüyor.{/n} "İşte gerçek bir âlemler hükümdarı! Bizim Ruoldo'nun onun yanında esamesi okunmaz. Keşke ben de Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} çizmelerinin tabanındaki yıldız tozunu tadabilsem! Ne bahtlısın Maive!"
languages.original_text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetkârların hepsi birden soluğunu tutuyor. Göbekli olan, başını sallayıp sana dönüyor.{/n} "İşte gerçek bir âlemler hükümdarı! Bizim Ruoldo'nun onun yanında esamesi okunmaz. Keşke ben de Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} çizmelerinin tabanındaki yıldız tozunu tadabilsem! Ne bahtlısın Maive!"

{n}Tüm insanlar aynı anda nefesini tutuyor. Göbekli hizmetkâr, başını sallayıp sana sesleniyor.{/n} "Bir lord ya da leydi sıkıldığında böyle olur. Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} daha iyi eğlendirmeliydin Maive."

languages.text: {n}使用人たちが一斉に息を呑んだ。太鼓腹の男が首を振って言った。{/n}「あれこそ真の世の統治者だよ。ルオルド様なんぞ足元に及ばない…ああ、俺も天の{rt_mf|君|姫}の靴の裏につく星屑を味わってみたいものだ！お前は運がいいよ、メイヴ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}使用人たちが一斉に息を呑んだ。太鼓腹の男が首を振って言った。{/n}「あれこそ真の世の統治者だよ。ルオルド様なんぞ足元に及ばない…ああ、俺も天の{rt_mf|君|姫}の靴の裏につく星屑を味わってみたいものだ！お前は運がいいよ、メイヴ！」

languages.text: {n}Les serviteurs ne peuvent retenir une exclamation. L'homme bedonnant secoue la tête et déclare :{/n} « On reconnaît bien là {rt_mf|un véritable souverain|une véritable souveraine}. Notre Ruoldo ne lui arrive pas à la cheville... J'aimerais tant pouvoir moi aussi goûter à la poussière d'étoiles sur les semelles de Sa Céleste Seigneurie ! Tu as une chance inouïe, Maive ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les serviteurs ne peuvent retenir une exclamation. L'homme bedonnant secoue la tête et déclare :{/n} « On reconnaît bien là {mf|un véritable souverain|une véritable souveraine}. Notre Ruoldo ne lui arrive pas à la cheville... J'aimerais tant pouvoir moi aussi goûter à la poussière d'étoiles sur les semelles de Sa Céleste Seigneurie ! Tu as une chance inouïe, Maive ! »

languages.text: {n}Alle Diener schnappen gleichzeitig nach Luft. Der Schmerbauch schüttelt den Kopf und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Das nenne ich {rt_mf|einen echten Weltenherrscher|eine echte Weltenherrscherin}. Dagegen sieht unser Ruoldo recht blass aus ... Könnte ich doch nur auch einmal den Sternenstaub von den Sohlen der Stiefel {rt_mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} schmecken! Ihr seid ein Glückskind, Maive!"
languages.original_text: {n}The servants all gasp at once. The pot-bellied one shakes his head and tells you,{/n} "There's a real ruler of worlds for you. Our Ruoldo isn't a patch on {rt_mf|him|her}... If only I could also taste the stardust from the soles of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s boots! You're so lucky, Maive!"

Könnte ich doch nur auch einmal den Sternenstaub von den Sohlen der Stiefel {mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} schmecken! Ihr seid ein Glückskind, Maive!"
